name: app_php_zend_server

recipes.app_php_zend_server::leave_cluster: remove the local server from Zend Server cluster
recipes.app_php_zend_server::vhost_patch: Patch the vhost file with docroot parameter and directory name
recipes.app_php_zend_server::install: Install Zend server and configure it as a standalone server
recipes.app_php_zend_server::default: set parameters for ZS install and add installation repositories
recipes.app_php_zend_server::join_cluster: Join the local Zend Server to Cluster of Zend Servers by adding it directly into the MySQL schema

app_php_zend_server/zend_license_key.description: Zend Server license key should be supplied by Zend or Rightscale coupled with the Zend Server order number

app_php_zend_server/mysql_address.description: Zend Server mysql DB host address accessible to this server

app_php_zend_server/repo_base_url.description: zend repository base url is the repository url without the suffix /deb or /rpm

app_php_zend_server/gui_password.description: A string that will be used as the password to Zend Server gui

app_php_zend_server/zend_server_name.description: Zend Server name to identify the server in the gui

app_php_zend_server/order_number.description: Zend Server order number should be supplied by Zend or Rightscale coupled with the license key

app_php_zend_server/mysql_user.description: Zend Server mysql user name that can create the schema and access it

app_php_zend_server/zend_server_node_ip.description: Zend Server IP accessible to other servers in the cluster

description: Installs the php application server Zend Server
